value.name: California Moves Forward: Long-Awaited Cop Decertification Bill Passes Senate and Moves to Assembly

value.name: California weighs opposing plans to deter police use of deadly force
value.description: "And we know no one will be held accountable." Ciara Hamilton, a cousin of Diante Yarber, a car theft suspect who was killed by Barstow police last year in a busy Southern California parking lot, said Weber's bill would allow that accountability.
